title: Himi 124
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’Oku ke ui au, ‘Eiki
Ke u hanga ‘o kumi
Ke u ma’u ho fofonga lelei,
‘I he’eku tui.
2.
Ko hoku loto pē ia,
Pea u fakaongo,
‘Eiki, ki ho fanafana
‘I ho’o anga’ofa.
3.
Ke poto ai hoku loto,
Pea u fa’a ongo’i,
‘A e ngāue ‘i loto,
‘A ho Laumālie.
4. Pea u mo’ua pehē ai pē
‘I he ngāue ‘a’au
Pea u hoko ‘o mamata
Ki ho kolōlia.
5.
Pea u hū mo ‘oni, ki ho
Fiefia’anga,
Pea u ma’u hoku hēvani,
‘I he ‘Afiona. *
